2006-07-21

Let's Get Out of this Country: Album of the year contenders #3

I'm playing a bit of catch-up withj my neglected blog - I've had the new Camera Obscura album for a month and it is just lovely - it's a summer album, it twangs with country sunshine and refreshes like a summer breeze - it'll be near the top come year end when the sunshine and summer breezes will be in short supply...
